name: Kimono Wedges - Shibori
description:
These gorgeous Kimono Wedges are handcrafted from a beautiful aqua, red and purple vintage silk kimono.

Outer: Vintage Silk Kimono 
Sole: Nude Leather 
Lining: Black Suede 
Heel Height 9cm 

Only 6 pairs of Shibori have been made.

Every pair of Dames & Divas shoes come beautifully gift wrapped with a complimentary bottle of Dames & Divas Silk & Suede Protector and include FREE postage.

Dames & Divas is an Australian fashion accessory label designing upcycled shoes & accessories that are beautiful, colourful & one of a kind.

Veisha is a gorgeous collection of women’s shoes, bags, jewellery & hair accessories handcrafted from vintage silk kimonos.

Kimonos are unstitched and transformed into beautiful pieces of wearable art.

No two items are the same and limited numbers can be made per kimono making every piece truly unique & special.

*Please note patterns may vary slightly from the images as every Veisha by Dames & Divas item is handmade from vintage kimono silk.

name: Kimono Cufflinks - Custom
description:
Kimono Cufflinks by Veisha by Dames and Divas

Dames and Divas Kimono Cufflinks are handmade from vintage silk kimono remnants.

Let us know your colour preference and we will make them just for you!

Bases are silver tone, with a tarnish resistant finish. 

Every pair of Dames and Divas Kimono Cufflinks are truly unique, beautiful and one of a kind. No two Kimono Cufflinks are the same.

Dames and Divas accessories are perfect for weddings, spring racing, special occasions or just because! We can also custom make shoes to suit your special occasion. Visit customer service for more information. 

Dames and Divas is a boutique Australian shoe and accessory label specialising in creating beautiful limited edition silk accessories.

1.5cm in diametre
Made especially for you (please let us know your colour preference).

name: Dames & Divas Nail Colours
description:
Coordinate your nails with a Dames & Divas Nail Colour.

Handmade and handblended each Dames & Divas nail colour is 3 free (no DPP, Formaldehyde or Toluene) and has no animal ingredients or testing. 

The new limited edition nail polish colours are available in four stunning shades that you will want to get your digits on including Sakurambou Red, Puramu Purple, Kogama Green and Taikou Pink.  

The striking colours feature heavily in our new range of vintage kimono shoes and accessories and we are thrilled to be able to offer our customers exclusive coordinating finger nail colours and toe nail colours to complement their look.

12ml 
Shake well before use 
Apply 2-3 coats and finish with a clear top coat

Only 50 bottles of each colour have been made.

Includes FREE postage.

name: Recycled Resin Necklaces
description:
by the piece by Dames & Divas recycled resin necklaces.

These gorgeous resin necklaces are individually handcrafted from recycled resin.

Little pieces of unsuccessful resin pours are up-cycled and re-created into lovely bright and bold resin necklaces.

The technique was discovered after exploring different ways of transforming unusable resin into up-cycled pieces of wearable art.

Featuring a bangle, bracelet, ring and necklace every piece is unique and available in four mesmerizing shades; red, yellow, blue and clear. 

Bead diameter: approximately 1.5cm 
Length: approximately 69cm (black ribbon tie)

All Dames & Divas products are handmade and one of a kind.

Dames and Divas is a boutique Australian shoe and accessory label specialising in creating beautiful limited edition accessories.

by the piece by Dames and Divas is a gorgeous new collection of women’s accessories handcrafted from recycled resin.

www.damesanddivas.com.au

name: Dames & Divas Silk & Suede Protector
description:
Dames & Divas Silk & Suede Protector 125ml

Protect & Preserve Silk & Suede Shoes, Bags & Accessories from Water & Stains

Suitable for use on silk & suede shoes, handbags, ties & accessories.  Also suitable for use on leather, denim & fabric.

Dames & Divas Silk & Suede Protector is water based & eco-friendly.

Made in Australia

Includes FREE postage.

Directions
Lightly spray a coat of Dames & Divas Silk & Suede Protector from a distance of 10cm.  Let the protector completely dry and repeat.  Reapplication depends on the amount of wear.  Daily wear requires weekly application; occasional wear requires application prior to use.  Should anything be spilt of dropped after it has been protected, simply wipe with a cloth & reapply.  Ensure metal & embellishments are covered prior to application.
